mapper.select: select rep.reported_at, rep.member_id , m.nickname as reporter_nickname, msg.nickname as reportee_nickname, rep.message_id, msg.content as message_content from ( SELECT member_id, message_id, reported_at FROM member_report WHERE TRUNC(reported_at) = TRUNC(SYSDATE) and process_status=#{processStatus} ) rep join member m on m.member_id = rep.member_id join message msg on msg.message_id = rep.message_id

select rep.reported_at, rep.member_id , m.nickname as reporter_nickname, msg.nickname as reportee_nickname, rep.message_id, msg.content as message_content, msg.sent_at as message_sent_at, msg.channel from ( SELECT member_id, message_id, reported_at FROM member_report WHERE message_id = #{messageId} ) rep join member m on m.member_id = rep.member_id join message msg on msg.message_id = rep.message_id
